data.allow_zone_hvac_mode_changes: Allow AC Mode Changes From Zones

data_description.allow_zone_hvac_mode_changes:
When selected exposes all air-conditioner modes from the zone climate entities.
Note: Changing the mode for one zone will change the mode for all zones.
data_description.spill_bypass: Select whether your system has been installed with a bypass damper or uses spill zone(s).

Set up integration settings below. If you are unsure leave the values unchanged.

spill_zones.title: Select spill zones
spill_zones.description:
Select the zones that are used as spill zones.
If you are unsure, leave all zones unselected.
